regressors module

dynamapp.regressors.generalized_torques_wrt_inertia(m: Model, q: jax.numpy.ndarray, v: jax.numpy.ndarray, a: jax.numpy.ndarray) → jax.numpy.ndarray[source]

Computes the regressor tensor of generalized torques with respect to inertia.

dynamapp.regressors.inertia_tensor_wrt_inertia(m: Model, q: jax.numpy.ndarray) → jax.numpy.ndarray[source]

Computes the regressor of the inertia matrix with respect to inertia tensor values.

dynamapp.regressors.generalized_torques_wrt_dhparams(m: Model, q: jax.numpy.ndarray, v: jax.numpy.ndarray, a: jax.numpy.ndarray) → jax.numpy.ndarray[source]

Computes the regressor tensor of generalized torques with respect to DH parameters.

dynamapp.regressors.generalized_torques_wrt_damping(m: Model, q: jax.numpy.ndarray, v: jax.numpy.ndarray, a: jax.numpy.ndarray) → jax.numpy.ndarray[source]

Computes the regressor tensor of generalized torques with respect to joint damping.

dynamapp.regressors.full_torques_wrt_inertia(m: Model, q: jax.numpy.ndarray, v: jax.numpy.ndarray, a: jax.numpy.ndarray, alpha: jax.numpy.ndarray, beta: jax.numpy.ndarray, gamma: jax.numpy.ndarray, dampings: list) → jax.numpy.ndarray[source]

Computes the regressor tensor of full torques with respect to inertia parameters.

dynamapp.regressors.full_torques_wrt_friction(m: Model, q: jax.numpy.ndarray, v: jax.numpy.ndarray, a: jax.numpy.ndarray) → jax.numpy.ndarray[source]

Computes the regressor tensor of full torques with respect to friction coefficients.

dynamapp.regressors.eigvals_wrt_inertia(ms: ModelState, q: jax.numpy.ndarray, v: jax.numpy.ndarray) → jax.numpy.ndarray[source]

Computes the Jacobian of eigenvalues with respect to inertia parameters.

dynamapp.regressors.eigvals_wrt_dhparams(ms: ModelState, q: jax.numpy.ndarray, v: jax.numpy.ndarray) → jax.numpy.ndarray[source]

Computes the Jacobian of eigenvalues with respect to DH parameters.

dynamapp.regressors.eigvals_wrt_damping(ms: ModelState, q: jax.numpy.ndarray, v: jax.numpy.ndarray) → jax.numpy.ndarray[source]

Computes the Jacobian of eigenvalues with respect to damping coefficients.

dynamapp.regressors.state_matrix_a_wrt_inertia(ms: ModelState, q: jax.numpy.ndarray, v: jax.numpy.ndarray) → jax.numpy.ndarray[source]

Computes the Jacobian of state matrix A with respect to inertia coefficients.

dynamapp.regressors.state_matrix_a_wrt_state(ms: ModelState, q: jax.numpy.ndarray, v: jax.numpy.ndarray) → jax.numpy.ndarray[source]

Computes the Jacobian of state matrix A with respect to state variables (q, v).
